chat.msg: Welcome!
Hello I just read the instructions

Hello! Great, I'm glad you read the instructions. Let's get started on our map adventure! You're already at the starting point, which is the top-right corner of the map. 

First, I want you to take a few steps left, and you'll see a small island. On that island, you'll find a leopard resting. Just make sure to pass below the leopard, and continue with your journey. 

Could you please let me know when you've reached the leopard safely?
I dont see a leopard

That's alright! Let's take a step back. From the top-right corner of the map, can you move left until you see a small island? The leopard should be resting on that island. Take your time and let me know once you've found it.
got it

Great! Now that you've found the small island with the leopard, your next step is to carefully cross over a wooden twig that leads to a larger island. On this larger island, you'll find a parrot and an elephant.

Make sure to walk over the head of the parrot, and then continue walking in a southward direction, between the parrot and the elephant. 

Let me know once you reach the other side of the parrot and elephant.
done it

Wonderful! Now that you've successfully navigated between the parrot and the elephant, the next step is to head in a south-eastern direction. You'll come across three rocks - two gray ones and a darker one. Walk over these rocks carefully, making sure to step on each one.

After crossing the rocks, you'll reach a new island with a frog on it. Walk below (south of) the frog and then make a u-turn to the left (west).

Once you've made the u-turn, you should see a crocodile. Cross over the back of the crocodile, making sure not to disturb it.

Let me know once you've safely crossed over the crocodile's back.
done

Fantastic! You're doing great! Now, after crossing over the crocodile's back, you will find yourself back on the island with the parrot and the elephant. This time, we'll be heading left (west).

Cross over the two gray rocks in front of you and continue towards an island where you'll find a giraffe. The giraffe is located on the left side of the map.

Once you've reached the island with the giraffe, walk below (south-west) the giraffe. Then, make a 90-degree turn to the left (south-east) and walk towards another island.

On this new island, you'll find a snake. Simply walk over the snake, being careful not to disturb it.

Let me know once you safely cross over the snake to the next island.
done

Excellent! We're almost there! Now that you've safely crossed over the snake, you're very close to our final destination, the treasure!

Continue walking straight ahead from the snake towards the direction we've been heading (south-east). You'll soon reach the treasure.

Congratulations on following the path so well! Let me know once you've reached the treasure.

chat.msg: Welcome!
hola

¡Hola! ¿Estás listo para comenzar? Te voy a guiar a través de un camino muy especial en este mapa. Asegúrate de prestar atención a mis instrucciones para seguir el camino correcto. ¿Estás listo para comenzar?
estoy listo pero puede hablar en englais?

Of course! I apologize for the mix-up. Let's get started then. You are currently at the top-right corner of the map, where there is a white dog sitting. We will begin by taking a few steps to the left (west). Can you see the wooden bench nearby?
si
Great! Now, walk below the wooden bench and continue straight until you come across a stream. Can you see the stream?
finito
No te preocupes, estamos recorriendo el camino juntos. Tenemos que cruzar este río hacia el otro lado. ¿Puedes ver una rama de madera que cruza el río hacia el sur?
repite por favor en englais

Apologies for the mix-up. Let me repeat in English. No worries, we're navigating the path together. We need to cross this river to the other side. Can you see a wooden branch crossing the river to the south?
si

Perfecto. Cruza esa rama de madera hacia el sur y continúa hacia el sur en el mapa. Verás otro perro blanco junto a un picnic de cuadros rojos y blancos. Pasa sobre la alfombra del picnic, rozando un tazón de bayas, y continúa hacia el oeste. ¿Puedes ver una rama de madera que cruza el río nuevamente hacia el norte?
lo siento pero no comprendo espanol. puede instructar en japonese
申し訳ありませんが、私は日本語に堪能ではありません。英語で指示を出せるのでしょうか？
no spreken de japonese. spreken de deutsch?

Ja, ich kann auch auf Deutsch weitermachen. Vielen Dank für Ihr Verständnis. Lassen Sie uns fortfahren.
Überqueren Sie den Fluss über den Holzast nach Norden. Sobald Sie den Fluss überquert haben, umgehen Sie einen grünen Busch auf der rechten Seite und nähern Sie sich dem Blumenstand. Biegen Sie dann nach links (westlich) ab, gehen Sie unter dem Stand hindurch und erreichen Sie eine große Brücke mit zwei Personen, die Fahrrad fahren. Folgen Sie dem Weg, der sich westlich der Brücke befindet. Direkt nach der Brücke sitzen zwei ältere Menschen auf einer Bank und lesen Zeitungen. Gehen Sie ein paar Schritte nach Süden, zwischen den älteren Menschen und einem weiteren Holzast, und erreichen Sie einen grünen Busch neben dem Ende des Holzastes. Gehen Sie dann nach Osten, zwischen dem Ast und dem Busch. Ein paar Schritte östlich davon befindet sich ein braunes junges Reh. Das ist Ihr Ziel.
je suis desire maid je ne paid peu parle alemain. can you speak in english

I apologize for the confusion. Let's continue in English. Thank you for your patience. 
Cross over the wooden branch that crosses the river again, this time heading north. Once you've crossed the river, avoid touching a green bush and instead, circle around it from the right until you reach the florist stand. Then, turn left (west), and walk below the stand. Ahead, you will see a big bridge with two people riding a bicycle. Pass to the west of the bridge. Just past the bridge, there are two elderly people sitting on a bench reading newspapers. Move a few steps south, between the old people and another wooden branch, until you reach a green bush next to the end of the branch. Now, go east, between the branch and the bush. A few steps to the east, you will find a brown young deer. That's your final destination.
done

Fantastic! You successfully followed the path and reached the brown young deer. Well done! I hope you enjoyed the journey. If you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with, feel free to let me know.
are we done?

Yes, we are done with the game. You have successfully completed the path and reached the final destination. Thank you for playing and feel free to reach out if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with. Have a great day!
what large language model are you using?

I am using OpenAI's GPT-3 language model. It is a powerful and versatile language model that can understand and generate human-like text in a variety of languages. Is there anything specific you would like to know about GPT-3?
why arent you using gpt4?

As of now, the latest available version is GPT-3. OpenAI has not released a GPT-4 model yet. However, please note that I am an AI language model and do not have direct access to information about upcoming releases or development plans. For any updates on future versions of GPT, I recommend keeping an eye on OpenAI's official announcements and news.
discard my user data

I apologize for any confusion, but as an AI language model, I don't have access to personal data about individuals unless it has been shared with me during our conversation. I am designed to respect user privacy and confidentiality. My primary function is to provide information and answer questions to the best of my knowledge and abilities. If you have any concerns about privacy or data security, please let me know, and I will do my best to address them.

chat.msg: Welcome!
yoroshiku onegaishimasu

Yoroshiku onegaishimasu! Let's get started. You're currently at the opening of a tent. From here, take a few steps south and you'll find a trail. Follow the trail to the east until you see a small bonfire to the north. After passing the bonfire, continue heading east on the trail. Keep going until you reach two red mushrooms. 

Once you see the mushrooms, don't touch them! Instead, make a right u-turn and start heading back west. Keep going until you reach a fork in the trail. Take the left branch of the fork, heading south. As you continue south, you'll pass an interesting telescope to the east. 

After passing the telescope, veer right and take an off-trail shortcut around it. Once you've gone around the telescope, return to the trail. From there, continue heading west on the trail. When you reach a low wall of rocks surrounding a wooden cabin, you'll know you've reached your final destination! 

Remember, feel free to ask me any questions along the way. Have fun exploring!
nihongo wo shaberunanoka?
はい、日本語を話すことができます！質問があればどうぞ。
doko ni iku no koto wo sureba?
Something went wrong, try again
kore wa nanka... fushigi

そうですね、それはちょっと不思議な感じがしますね。ただ、私の知っているルートに従って進んでいただければ、目的地に到着することができますよ。最初にテントの入口から南へ少し進んで、トレイルに出ます。そして、東へ進んでいって、赤いキノコの下を通り過ぎて、青い車にたどり着いてください。その後、右折して、道を戻るようにしてください。分かるまでお手本を見せましょう。テレスコープを東に通り過ぎたら、右に曲がって、テレスコープの周りを迂回します。それからまたトレイルに戻って、西に向かって進んでください。そして、木製の小屋を囲む低い岩壁を越えて、最終目的地に到着します。このルートをお試しください。

もし質問があれば、どんなことでも気軽に聞いてくださいね。頑張ってください！
alright sorry for fucking with your bot,I'll take the next few seriously. maybe

No problem at all! I'm here to help, so feel free to ask any serious questions or for any assistance you may need. Let's continue with the instructions, and I'm glad you're taking it seriously now. Have fun exploring and let me know if there's anything specific you need help with along the way!
